english.segment1: Come to Me, you who are weak. Let My strength be yours tonight. Come and rest, let My love be your bed. Let My heart be yours tonight
english.segment2: (Chorus:). Peace be still, Peace be still. Please be still and know that I am God. and know that I am God
english.segment3: Come empty cup, let Me fill you up. I'll descend on you like a dove tonight. Lift your head, let your eyes fall into Mine. Let your fear subside tonight
